All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.Shape, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
public class Ball
extends MovingImage

This class represents a ball controlled by the player that can move freely.

Author:
Yuta Arai

act

public void act(java.util.ArrayList<java.awt.Shape> obstacles)
Slows down the ball and updates the location of the ball based on the x and y velocity. Reverses the direction of the ball when it collides with an obstacle.

Parameters:
obstacles - - the obstacles that the ball can collide with
